In addition, given that the sections are already permeabilized, we do not contemplate the use of this detergent.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2va3p","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":7,"offset":61,"style":"bold"}],"key":"220hn","text":"Please note that the proposed antibody incubation lasts only 3 hours. Although in most cases staining protocols recommend overnight incubation for primary antibodies, the tests performed in our lab showed better efficiency at room temperature.
